document_data.name: Create Direguard
document_data.mainbody: '''''Create direguard''''' was a [[divine magic]] spell available to [[cleric]]s of [[Cyric]], Prince of Madness. It animated a [[direguard]] out of an intact skeleton. but this spell was specific to Cyric and a jealously guarded secret.
document_data.Effects: This spell took one minute to cast and the cleric had to touch the skeleton that was to be animated. Upon completion, flames of red ignited in the skeleton's eye sockets and the direguard rose ready to attack, wearing armor that was shadowy black but with the bones visible through it.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required an intact skeleton of approximately [[human]] size or smaller, and 20 drops of blood from a true [[dragon]].
document_data.History: This spell was an improved version of the ''[[create baneguard]]'' spell used by priests of [[Bane]], the Black Hand. although the caster who wanted to create a direguard had to be more experienced than a caster that could just learn ''create baneguard''.
